properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY DECODE(NM.NM_APPROVAL, 'D', 1) DESC, NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT NM_TITLE , NM_POSTER , NM_ENROLL_DATE , NM_APPROVAL , NM_STORY , NM.MEM_NO AS MEM_NO , M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM JOIN MEMBER M ON (NM.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE NM_APPROVAL = ? ORDER BY NM.NM_ENROLL_NO DESC

INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_ENROLL ( NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_TITLE , NM_STORY , NM_RELEASE_DATE , NM_RUN_TIME , NM_USER_REQUEST , NM_NICKNAME_STATUS , NM_NATION , NM_VIEW_GRADE , MEM_NO , NM_POSTER , NM_PREVIEW ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO NO_MOVIE_CAST ( NM_CAST_NO , PERSON_NO , NM_ENROLL_NO , NM_CASTING ) VALUES ( SEQ_NO_MOVIE_CAST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SEQ_NO_MOVIE_ENROLL_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
